content: Compose a [ Twitter ] post to promote the upcoming Data & AI United conference. Highlight the keynote speakers and mention the various topics that will be discussed. Use relevant hashtags and tag the conference handle for maximum reach.

🚀 Excited for the Data & AI United Conference 2023! Join us to gain insights from industry leaders like @KeynoteSpeaker1, @KeynoteSpeaker2, and @KeynoteSpeaker3. Dive into topics like #MachineLearning, #BigData, #AIethics, and more. Be part of the future! 📅 #DataAIUnited2023 #TechInnovation @DataAIUnitedConference 🌐 Don't miss out! Register now!
